org.dellroad.stuff.vaadin

Interface PropertyExtractor<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - target object type for extraction

    public interface PropertyExtractor<T>
    Classes that can extract Property values from Java objects.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <V> V getPropertyValue(T obj, PropertyDef<V> propertyDef)
      Read the value of the property defined by propertyDef from the given object.

    • Method Detail

      • getPropertyValue

        <V> V getPropertyValue(T obj,
                     PropertyDef<V> propertyDef)
        Read the value of the property defined by propertyDef from the given object.
        Parameters:
        obj - Java object
        propertyDef - definition of which property to read
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if either parameter is null
